data.text: @sarahhorsepaste Lock them in the gulag forever. They didnt get it wrong by accident. They got it wrong for unlimited power.
@sarahhorsepaste Crimes, not errors. Prison, not apologies.
@sarahhorsepaste @Canadia56668243 Apologies not enough.  They must be held accountable
@sarahhorsepaste Most will require lengthy prison stays
@sarahhorsepaste Apologize????!!!!!! Tried and convicted and executed!!!!! Milllions billions potentially harmed or dead BECAUSE OF THESE BASTARDS!!  This is the greatest crime in history of mankind
@sarahhorsepaste These politicians re responsible for the intentional (or at least gross negligence) deaths of MANY people. Sorry ain't good enough. Criminal proceedings.
@sarahhorsepaste I dont need them to admit & apologize when data was available for months & now is an overwhelming flood. I want them to be held personally accountable for destroying Canadian lives.
@sarahhorsepaste Forget the apologies. Use a belt or a bed sheet, a running car in the garage, or too many sleeping pills. You’ll get no forgiveness from me. They can’t put them in jail long enough.
@sarahhorsepaste LOL... apologize and what? pinky swear that they will never trample our rights again?
